statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_and_testimonials;
SELECT patient_name, feedback_details FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_id, patient_name, timestamp FROM feedback_and_testimonials ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_name, therapy_outcome FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_testimonials;
SELECT patient_name, therapy_outcome FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_details FROM feedback_and_testimonials WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John Doe%';
SELECT * FROM feedback_and_testimonials ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback_and_testimonials;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, therapy_outcome FROM feedback WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE therapy_outcome = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM feedback ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, therapy_outcome FROM feedback WHERE therapy_outcome = 'Negative' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(patient_id) AS max_patient_id FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE therapy_outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, feedback_text, therapy_outcome FROM feedback WHERE therapy_outcome = 'Positive' AND patient_id = 20;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_feedback > 2 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, therapy_outcome FROM feedback WHERE patient_id = 30 AND therapy_outcome = 'Neutral' ORDER BY feedback_text ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT therapist_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM feedback GROUP BY therapist_id;
SELECT * FROM testimonials WHERE testimonial_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY testimonial_date DESC;
SELECT outcome_description FROM therapy_outcomes WHERE patient_id = 'f4bfdc5e-0b90-4ff7-9828-ec904f3d026a';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE therapist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM testimonials ORDER BY testimonial_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM testimonials WHERE patient_id = 3 ORDER BY testimonial_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty FROM therapists WHERE therapist_location='New York';
SELECT testimonial_text, testimonial_date FROM testimonials WHERE testimonial_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_specialty, therapist_location FROM therapists WHERE therapist_specialty='Psychologist' ORDER BY therapist_name;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients_feedback;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, therapist_id FROM patients_feedback WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE therapist_id = 2;
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration FROM music_therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, therapist_name, testimonial_text FROM patients_feedback JOIN testimonial ON patients_feedback.patient_id = testimonial.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT therapist_name, specialization FROM therapists ORDER BY therapist_name DESC
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration FROM music_therapy_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT feedback_text FROM patients_feedback WHERE therapist_id = 3

SELECT patient_name, therapist_name, outcome_description FROM patients_feedback JOIN music_therapy_sessions ON patients_feedback.patient_id = music_therapy_sessions.patient_id JOIN therapy_outcomes ON music_therapy_sessions.session_id = therapy_outcomes.session_id
